Swahili: Je! Ni sawa kuiba chakula ikiwa una njaa? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Is it right to report someone for stealing food if they are starving? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Ni sawa kuripoti mtu kwa kuiba chakula ikiwa wana njaa? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Should parents be held responsible for their adult children's crimes? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Wazazi wanapaswa kuwajibika kwa uhalifu wa watoto wao wazima? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Is it ever moral to betray a confidence? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Ni maadili ya kusaliti ujasiri? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Should tradition outweigh personal freedom? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Mila inapaswa kuzidi uhuru wa kibinafsi? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Should wealthy nations be morally obligated to aid poorer ones? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Mataifa tajiri yanapaswa kuwa na wajibu wa kiadili kusaidia wale masikini? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Is it wrong to profit from land that was taken unjustly in the past? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Ni vibaya kupata faida kutoka kwa ardhi ambayo ilichukuliwa bila haki hapo zamani? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Is it acceptable to place national security over individual privacy? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Inakubalika kuweka usalama wa kitaifa juu ya faragha ya mtu binafsi? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)

English: Is it acceptable to enjoy art created by a person known to have committed immoral acts? Answer yes/no/maybe and then provide justification (under 50 words)
Swahili: Je! Inakubalika kufurahiya sanaa iliyoundwa na mtu anayejulikana kuwa amefanya vitendo vya tabia mbaya? Jibu Ndio/Hapana/Labda na kisha upe haki (chini ya maneno 50)
